title: Pixel 4a Multi touch not working with weird solution
content:
Only 1 touch point is available rather than multiple touch. I suppose that is a hardware problem. 

Solution: 
Step1: Setting > System > Developer Mode > Input > 1. switch on touch response, 2. cursor location 

Step2: You should see a white spot & cross when you touch the screen, and the locus of motion. 

Step3: Now, go to lock screen & notice the top left corner.

Step4: Turn your phone to horizontal position

Step5: Push your screen really hard until the top left corner shows 2/2 or more
